SA15n1237:12: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ |
SA15n1237:13: yathā dharmī śabdo'nitya iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ |
SA15n1237:38: 12. yathā dhūmādirdharmī buddhimaddhetūtpannaḥ sādhya iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ |
SA15n1237:41: vedavacanaṃ dharmyapauruṣeyamiti sādhye śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyaka iti pauruṣeyatvasya siddheḥ ||
SA15n1237:53: sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ pratyātmā cetana iti sādhyam ||
SA15n1237:55: vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇamātmeti kāyaḥ sthirasvabhāva iti vā ||
SA15n1237:58: yo heturivābhāsate na tu hetutvena sidhyati ||
SA15n1237:62: 24. pakṣe sapakṣe cāsan vipakṣe ca san [yaḥ] sa viruddha iti hetvābhāsaḥ sādhyaviparītasiddheḥ ||
SA15n1237:63: 25. sapakṣavipakṣayorubhayorbhāve'bhāve vā saṃśaye vāsiddhapratibandho yo hetuḥ so'naikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ |
SA15n1237:67: 27. cetanastaruriti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇāditi hetuḥ prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ pratyasiddha iti prativādyasiddhaścittādinirodhasya bauddhasyeṣṭatvāt ||
SA15n1237:68: 28. acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhye utpattimattvāditi hetuḥ sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino'siddha iti vādyasiddhaḥ ||
SA15n1237:69: 29. vaiśeṣikeṇa prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ prati pṛthivyādirdharmī kārya iti sādhya ekaikakṣaṇavadanyānyotpādāditi vādinaḥ svayamasiddhaḥ |
SA15n1237:72: cetanāstaravaḥ svāpāditi hetuścandane vādinaḥ svayaṃ pakṣaikadeśe'siddhaḥ |
SA15n1237:73: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ ||
SA15n1237:74: 31. evameva kṣityādirgharmī buddhimajjāta iti sādhye kāryamiti heturbauddhaṃ pratyasiddhaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhasiddhasvarūpeṇa kṣityādīnāṃ siddheḥ |
SA15n1237:77: yadīha dhūmaḥ syādatra vahniḥ syāditi sādhye hetvaniścayāt ||
SA15n1237:79: eṣvanekeṣu nikuñjeṣu kasmiṃścin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyitāditi heturiti ||
SA15n1237:84: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatra varttamānaḥ sādhāraṇo'naikāntika iti ||
SA15n1237:85: 38. evaṃ śabdo nitya iti sādhye śrāvaṇatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe cāvṛtterasādhāraṇo'naikāntikaḥ ||
SA15n1237:86: 39. evaṃ śabdasyāprayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye'nityatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti rvipakṣavyāpyanaikāntikaḥ |
SA15n1237:92: 40. evaṃ śabdasya prayatnānantīyakatve sādhye'nityatvāditi hetu rghaṭādau sarvatra [vidyate] |
SA15n1237:97: dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye'mūrttatvāditi hetuḥ |
SA15n1237:99: tatra sapakṣaikadeśa ākāśe'mūrttatvaṃ vidyate na paramāṇau paramāṇūnāṃ mūrttatvāt |
SA15n1237:103: kapilādi rdharmyasarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣādau sapakṣe vidyate vipakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ |
SA15n1237:106: ṛṣabhavardhamānādi rdharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevalaśāstrakarttṛtvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ |
SA15n1237:111: jīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmake nirātmake vā varttamāno vyāvṛtto vetyaniścayaḥ ||
SA15n1237:115: dṛṣṭāntābhāvādanvayasyāniścayo vyatirekasya ca niścaya ityayaṃ saṃdigdho hetuḥ ||
SA15n1237:118: 49. yathā dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhyadharmaḥ |
SA15n1237:119: kṛtakatvādākāśādivadityayaṃ heturghaṭādau vipakṣa eva vidyate na sapakṣe ||
SA15n1237:120: 50. evaṃ dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣa ākāśādau nāsti ghaṭādāvekadeśe'sti vidyudādau nāstīti |
SA15n1237:123: ete cakṣurādayaḥ parārthā iti sādhyadharmaḥ saṃghātatvāditi hetuḥ śayanāsanādivaditi sapakṣanirdeśaḥ |
SA15n1237:124: ayaṃ heturyathā cakṣurādeḥ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati tathā saṃhatatvamapi parasya sādhayati |
SA15n1237:127: dharmyādirbuddhimataḥ kāraṇādutpadyata iti sādhye sāśratvāditi hetuḥ |
SA15n1237:129: yathānena hetunā buddhimaddhetuto jātatvaṃ sādhyate tathā buddhimatkarttuḥ sāśrayatvamapi sādhyate ||
SA15n1237:131: vaiśeṣikeṇa yogācāraṃ prati dharmyātmā cetanā iti sādhye vijñānādhiṣṭhānāditi hetu ryathācetanamātmānaṃ cetanaṃ sādhayati tathāyaṃ heturanityamapi sādhayati vijñānasyānityatvāt ||
SA15n1237:133: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī kutrāpi hetudoṣo na bhavatīti tasyodāharaṇopanyāso na yuktaḥ |
SA15n1237:139: yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sadyatra nopalabhyate na tat [tatra] asti |
SA15n1237:144: sapakṣādanyo dṛṣṭānto na kaścidastīti sapakṣa evāyaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānto bhavati |
SA15n1237:155: maraṇadharmā puruṣa iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣadṛṣṭānte saṃdigdhaḥ |
SA15n1237:158: dharmī kaścit puruṣaḥ [a-]sarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetuḥ |
SA15n1237:172: sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptirdarśanīyā sādhanena tu sādhyasya vyāptirdarśitā |
SA15n1237:178: iha paramāṇurvaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iti sādhanadharmo'mūrttatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrttatvātparamāṇunām |
SA15n1237:182: iha sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ karmaṇo'nityatvāt sādhanadharmo na vyāvṛtto'mūrttatvātkarmaṇaḥ ||
SA15n1237:185: atrākāśādervaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam ||
SA15n1237:192: iha vaidharmyodāharaṇa ukta ṛṣabhavardhamānāderasarvajñatvaṃ vyāvṛttamavyāvṛttaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ ||
SA15n1237:194: iha trayīvidā brāhmaṇena kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo na grāhyavacano rāgādimattvāditi |
SA15n1237:195: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇamucyate yo grāhyavacano na sa rāgādimān yathā gotamādayaḥ dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti |
SA15n1237:200: yo vītarāgaḥ sa na parigrahāgrahavān yathā ṛṣabhavarddhemānādiriti |
SA15n1237:208: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti |
SA15n1237:209: yadyapīdamupalakhaṇḍādvyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi sarvasmādvītarāgādvaktṛtvaṃ na vyāvṛttaṃ sandehāt ||
SA15n1237:214: evaṃ yannityaṃ tatsarvaṃ niyatamakṛtakaṃ dṛśyate yathākāśādiriti vāgvibhāgo vaktrā karttavyaḥ |
SA15n1237:225: yadā pūrvapakṣavādino'bhūtaṃ doṣamudbhāvayati [tadā] sa dūṣaṇābhāso jātiriti |
SA15n1237:227: yathā pakṣadoṣābhāve pakṣadoṣodbhāvanaṃ hetudoṣābhāve hetudoṣodbhāvanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣābhāve ca dṛṣṭāntadoṣodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti ||
SA15n1237:229: pratijñā hetuḥ [udāharaṇam] upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanamiti |
SA15n1237:232: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādirityudāharaṇam |
SA15n1237:239: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayorvyāptipratipādanamanvaya ityucyate ||
SA15n1237:243: pratijñā nigamanaṃ ca sarvathā na vaktavye ||
SA15n1237:245: yathā yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ śabdo'pi kṛtaka iti sādharmyaprayogaḥ |
SA15n1237:248: yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ śabdastu kṛtaka iti vaidharmyaprayogaḥ ||
SA15n1237:254: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayeti samāsenābhidheyaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ |
SA15n1237:255: pratyakṣo'vabodhaḥ pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ ceti yuktaṃ bhavati ||
SA15n1237:256: 91. cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ nāsikā jihvā kāyaśceti pañcendriyāṇi |
SA15n1237:257: tadāśritasya jñānasya pañca grāhyaviṣayā rūpaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyañceti pañcaiva prameyāṇi ||
SA15n1237:258: 92. tacca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanāpoḍhaṃ nirvikalpaṃ vā yadi punarabhrāntaṃ pramāṇamucyate pradarśitārthe'visaṃvādāt |
SA15n1237:265: ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānaṃ ca |
SA15n1237:268: vyāvahārikamindriyajñānaṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāsphuṭaprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti ||
SA15n1237:275: 98. tatra svārthaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmagrahaṇāt sādhyasādhanasambandhasmṛteḥ paścāt pratipatturarthasya yathāvadyā pratītistadeva svārthānumānam ||
SA15n1237:280: agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvo yathā sajale deśa iti atra tu dhūmāditi ||
SA15n1237:284: iha punastena vyāpakena rūpeṇa vyāpyo hetuḥ ||

SA15n1237:298: 108. yatpārthivaṃ tatsarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛśyate yathā vṛkṣādaya iti |
